text: Ezɨ abuir gumazir kam kamaghɨn akam ikaragha ghaze, “Nan gumazir ekiam pura akar kamɨn ia ko ian gumazir ekiam, a iarara mɨkɨmasa na amadazir pu. Puvatɨ. Gumazir dɨvazim gisɨn tuivighav itiba, me uaghan akar kam baragham. Guizbangɨra, mɨdorozim otoghtɨ, e Jerusalem ekɨarugham, eghtɨ dughiar kuram bar ia batogham. Eghtɨ ia gumazir dɨvazim gisɨn tuivighav itiba, ia bar dagheba puvatɨghɨva uan buaribar amɨva, uan mɨsɨzir pabar amam.”
